name: Bronya Zaychik (Heart of the Night)/(Neonized) | Honkai Impact 3rd | LoRA
description:
A LoRA Model of Bronya Zaychik from Honkai Impact 3rd.

There are two sets of trigger words:

For triggering Heart of the Night:

bronya zaychik \(heart of the night\), red pupils, bronya zaychik, gloves, black gloves, long hair, grey eyes, breasts, hair between eyes, grey hair, single sleeve, large breasts, bangs, dress, hair ornament, earrings, jewelry, drill hair, short sleeves, black dress, twin drills, half gloves, see-through

For triggering Neonized, append the following text to the upper words:

purple-tinted eyewear, tinted eyewear, round eyewear, sunglasses, glasses, looking over eyewear

bonus: For trigger Any Custom Outfit:(experimental)

bronya zaychik, red pupils, breasts, long hair, grey hair, bangs, grey eyes, earrings, drill hair, twin drills, hair between eyes, large breasts, [Explain in detail what clouthes you would like to trigger......]

You may consider movingred pupilsinto the negative prompts, if you don't like it.

Recommend 0.8-1 Strength for triggering any official costume.

For changing custom clothes, I suggest 0.7-0.85 Weight

The preview images were generated by the AbyssOrangeMix series Model.

In some examples, images applied ControlNet.

I am using the NAI model [e6e8e1fc] to train.

Able to work with all mixed models based on NAI(i.e. AbyssOrangeMix, Anything v3, ChilloutMix)

If you like this LoRA, please comment and give it a like.❤️

Any suggestions are welcome to comment here.

And also welcome to share your creations.

Enjoy it!

This LoRA contains 3 hidden costumes, let's try to check the metadata to find out the trigger words.
